messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: Dear Voter, I've lived in Watford since 1985 so local issues matter to me: ensuring the lowest possible council tax; no income tax; easing the relentless pressure on our schools and Watford General Hospital; helping Watford's proud amateurs by opposing the chaos HS2 will bring to our countryside; protect our Green Belt and allotments. This is the most significant vote on local change for decades. Politics is changing. Your vote can change things for the better, Watford. Vote UKIP - your only option for dedicated non home rule party representation in our great election for decades the better for Watford. Yours truly.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensuring the lowest possible council tax; no income tax.
Easing the relentless pressure on our schools and Watford General Hospital.
Protecting Watford's countryside from the chaos HS2 will bring; protecting our Green Belt and allotments.

issues.education: Easing the relentless pressure on our schools.

issues.health: Easing the relentless pressure on Watford General Hospital.

housing.content: Protecting our Green Belt and allotments.

leaflet.personalStatement: I've lived in Watford since 1985 so local issues matter to me.
leaflet.additionalNotes: Please put this in your window - NO MORE LEAFLETS THANK YOU. UKIP - Believe in Britain.
